japanese_title: 梟の神が自ら歌った謡「コンクワ」
japanese_translation: (1) katken......川ガラス.昔から大そういい鳥として尊ばれる鳥です.
chinese_translation: katken......河烏。自古以來，牠是一種備受尊敬的鳥類，被視為非常吉祥的鳥。
english_translation: (1) katken......River Dipper. It is a bird that has been highly respected as a very good bird since ancient times.
comment: Translated from English to Traditional Chinese, keeping the original meaning and using modern Chinese. Terms that are difficult to translate are kept in the original language (English/Japanese).
